content:
This Thursday Lincoln will welcome one of the worldsgreat ballet companies when the Bolshoi Ballet performs atthe Lied Center for Performing Arts.The company of  featuring prima ballerinas NataliaArkhipova and Maria Bylova will present Act II of  one of the most poignant ballets ever written.After several shorter pieces the ensemble will present a lively piece that traces the bumblingantics of Cervantes knighterrant.The Bolshoi is Moscows premier dance company gearedto massive endeavors with its huge rehearsal and teachingstaff and company of  dancers PERIOD The Bolshoi Ballet hasbeen hailed for its dramatic staging and passionateperformances.Fyodor Lupukhov one of the most significant figures inSoviet ballet wrote that in the Bolshoi Ballet one can seeTwo preperformance talks will be given in the LiedCenters Steinhart Room by Lisa Fusillo director andprofessor of dance with the UNL Department of Theatre Artsand Dance PERIOD The talks will take place  minutes and 30minutes before curtain.Tickets are   and  and halfprice forstudents PERIOD They are available at the Lied Box Office weekdaysfrom  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD and  minutes before theperformance PERIOD
